title: 1959년 Siegal 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Siegal. 판결일: 1959-03-11. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Herbert S. Siegal, on Behalf of Anthony Vellucci, against Warden of Attica State Prison
**판결일**: 1959-03-11
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 8 A.D.2d 583

## 판결문 요약


Order affirmed, without costs of this appeal to either party. All concur. (Appeal from an order of Wyoming County Court dismissing a writ of habeas corpus and remanding the prisoner to the custody of the Warden of Attica Prison.) Present — McCurn, P. J., Kimball, Bastow, Goldman and Halpern, JJ.
...
